title: ITTF President says unifying Korea teams at world championships is good for peace
text:
ITTF President says unifying Korea teams at world championships is good for peace 10:44am BST - 01:34
The President of the International Table Tennis Federation says the unification of the Korean teams midway through the tournament was an attempt to further peace efforts.
The President of the International Table Tennis Federation says the unification of the Korean teams midway through the tournament was an attempt to further peace efforts. //reut.rs/2KAyHci
